member.name: T:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine
member.summary: Specifies the type of line breaks for the generated text output.

member.name: F:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine.CRLF
member.summary: Microsoft Windows, DEC TOPS-10, RT-11 and most other early non-Unix and non-IBM OSes, CP/M, MP/M, DOS (MS-DOS, PC-DOS, etc.), Atari TOS, OS/2, Symbian OS, Palm OSCrLf,

member.name: F:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine.LFCR
member.summary: Acorn BBC and RISC OS spooled text output.

member.name: F:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine.CR
member.summary: Commodore 8-bit machines, Acorn BBC, TRS-80, Apple II family, Mac OS up to version 9 and OS-9

member.name: F:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine.LF
member.summary: Multics, Unix and Unix-like systems (GNU/Linux, Mac OS X, FreeBSD, AIX, Xenix, etc.), BeOS, Amiga, RISC OS and others.

member.name: F:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine.NEL
member.summary: Next line (Unicode U+0085)

member.name: F:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine.LS
member.summary: Line separator (Unicode U+2028)

member.name: F:Scotec.T4Generator.EndOfLine.PS
member.summary: Paragraph separator (Unicode U+2029)

member.name: M:Scotec.T4Generator.IGenerator.Compile(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Asynchronously precompiles a list of templates without generating text. You don't have to wait until this method has finished. You can start generating text immediately.
member.param: A list of templates to precompile.
member.returns: Return a Task object. This can be used to wait until the compilation has finished.

member.name: M:Scotec.T4Generator.IGenerator.Compile(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asynchronously precompiles a list of templates without generating text. You don't have to wait until this method has finished. You can start generating text immediately.
member.param: A list of templates to precompile.
The generator always creates and loads a new assembly for the given template
member.returns: Return a Task object. This can be used to wait until the compilation has finished.

member.name: T:Scotec.T4Generator.IGeneratorSettings
member.summary: Generator settings interface.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.IGeneratorSettings.ReferencePaths
member.summary: Gets a list of reference paths. A reference path will be used to relolve assembly references. You can your application specific reference paths to the list.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.IGeneratorSettings.ReferenceAssemblies
member.summary: Gets a list of referenced assemblies. Typically, assemblies will be referenced in the assembly directive of a T4 template. However, you can add additional assemblies to this list.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.IGeneratorSettings.Options
member.summary: Returns a dictionary with CodeDomProvider specific options.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.IGeneratorSettings.EndOfLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the line break characters for the generated textual output. Default is LineEnding.CrLf.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.IGeneratorSettings.TemplateParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a dictionary containing key/value pairs that can be used as variables used in assembly, import, include, parameters, and template directives.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.Syntax.FeatureControlBlock.Length
member.summary: Returns the lengths of the regex match. To get the lenght of the content, use Content.Lenght.

member.name: T:Scotec.T4Generator.T4CompilerException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the compilation of the generated code fails.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.T4CompilerException.Errors
member.summary: Gets the list of compiler errors.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.T4CompilerException.GeneratedCode
member.summary: Gets the generated code that could not be compiled.

member.name: P:Scotec.T4Generator.T4CompilerException.CodeBehind
member.summary: Gets the subsidiary code that has been referenced in the template directive.

member.name: T:Scotec.T4Generator.T4Exception
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the text generation fails.

member.summary: Base class for the generated classes. This class should be used by the generator only.

member.summary: The line ending used for the generated text.
